TopicTitle: Intrepid Series Multi-mission Interplanetary Vehicle: reliability meets versatility

Articles.Content:
The Intrepid series is a capable line of interplanetary vessels capable of serving nearly any roll needed. They have been thoroughly tested under many different stress conditions and distances.

These vessels can easily make the trip to Eve, Duna, Dres, Jool and any of their moons. The Intrepid line is also capable of return from any of those destinations. It has power, turning torque, optimized mass, and an entire array of docking ports for any purpose you might dream up. It can even serve as a space station or refueling depot. Take a look:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Intrepid V (Inverted 3-seater: control with probe core in aft of central hull):https://www.dropbox.com/s/lnzyskxz8ueef9s/Intrepid%20V%20Stock.craft

~~Please note: In all versions of craft special action button 1 will toggle the primary nuclear engines on/off. Use to control fuel consumption at launch and reignite when at optimal height.~~
